BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE EST_HOSPITAL_BILL_DTL SET STR_EXPENDITURE_HEAD_NAME=?,STR_ESI_NO=?,STR_EPF_NO=?,STR_PAN_NO=?,NUM_NO_OF_CALLS=?,NUM_VEHICLE_ID=?,STR_REQ_SLIP_NO=?,DT_FUEL_FILLING_DATE=?,NUM_SUPPLIER_ID=?,NUM_QUANTITY=?,NUM_TAX_AMOUNT=?,STR_SUPPLIER_WORK_ORDER_NO=?,DT_REPAIR_DATE=?,DT_PAYMENT_DATE=?,DT_BILL_FRM_DATE=?,DT_BILL_TO_DATE=?,DT_BILL_DUE_DATE=?,NUM_BILL_AMOUNT=?,STR_BRIEF_DTL=?,GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND NUM_BILL_REFERENCE_NO=?
UPDATE EST_HOSPITAL_BILL_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_BILL_REFERENCE_NO=?

UPDATE EST_HOSPITAL_BILL_DTL SET STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE=?,DT_BILL_DUE_DATE=?,STR_INSTRUMENT_NUMBER=?,DT_INSTRUMENT_DATE=?,DT_INSTR_RECEV_DATE=?,STR_BANK_NAME=?,NUM_BILL_AMOUNT_TO_PAID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND NUM_BILL_REFERENCE_NO=?
